amendment.description: An amendment numbered 34 printed in Part A of House Report 119-255 to insert the text of H.R. 1488, repealing the 2002 and 1991, Authorization for Use of Military Force (AUMFs).
amendment.purpose: Amendment inserts the text of H.R. 1488, repealing the 2002 and 1991 AUMFs (Authorization for Use of Military Force).

vote.text: On agreeing to the Meeks amendment (A023) Agreed to by recorded vote: 261 - 167 (Roll no. 244).

action.text: House amendment agreed to: On agreeing to the Meeks amendment (A023) Agreed to by recorded vote: 261 - 167 (Roll no. 244).
Roll call votes on amendments in House
